alert.note: Alert for Bracken; Mason; Robertson (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 10:24PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHWESTERN MASON, ROBERTSON AND SOUTHERN BRACKEN COUNTIES THROUGH 1100 PM EDT... At 1023 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located 8 miles northeast of Cynthiana, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Mount Olivet, Germantown, Sardis, US Route 62 at State Route 875, Blue Licks Battlefield, Abigail, Milford, Burika, Alhambra, Stonewall, Mitchells Mill, Santa Fe, Peed, Lowell, Kentontown, Petra, Piqua, US Route 62 at State Route 616, Hittville and Blue Licks Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
